axis_1553_string_decoder
module axis_1553_string_decoder #(
parameter 
byte_swap
 = 
0
) ( input aclk, input arstn, input [167:0] s_axis_tdata, input s_axis_tvalid, input [20:0] s_axis_tkeep, input s_axis_tlast, output s_axis_tready, output [15:0] m_axis_tdata, output m_axis_tvalid, output [ 7:0] m_axis_tuser, input m_axis_tready )

Carrige return terminated string converted to 1553 data.

Parameters
byte_swap
parameter

swap input byte order.

Ports
aclk

Master Clock

arstn

Negative Reset

s_axis_tdata

Input raw data

s_axis_tvalid

Input raw data is valid

s_axis_tuser

Input raw user field

s_axis_tready

Input ready for characters

m_axis_tdata

Output string.

m_axis_tvalid

Output string is valid

m_axis_tlast

Indicates output string termination

m_axis_tkeep

What bytes are valid characters in the string.

m_axis_tready

Is the next device ready for output?
